name: Hugo: Bukkazoom
storyline: For unexplained reasons, Hugo, his family, and some of his best friends and worst enemies have been shrunk to the size of an aphid. They now drive through the world of aphids with carts.
summary: Hugo: Bukkazoom! is a 3D racing game based starring Hugo the TV Troll, a popular cartoon character on Danish television. In this game Hugo is shrunk to the size of little green creatures called greenflies. He must race a kart through marshes, deserts and various landscapes. The circuits have checkpoints, upgrades and a scoring system open to different possible strategies. Both single-player and multiplayer games for up to two players are supported.
